title: Leanna: Possession of a Woman
description: The life and death of Leanna de Noux was more than a mystery to Hailey Martin. It was the ultimate obsession. A writer from the Midwest, Hailey came to New Orleans to recover from a devastating personal loss. There, in the heart of the French Quarter, she found a room with a strange, macabre history. A room haunted by terrible secrets, forbidden longings -- and Leanna.
author: Marie Kiraly
